title: Arcade Miss Fortune lost her unique auto attack sounds a few patches ago
body:
Friendly reminder that this is still happening, and there was no fix in the latest patch.

Please look into it again.

replies.body: Thank for the report, bag of salt -- sorry that it has become a reminder at this point. :(  We'll look into it.
They really need to fix that. The mixed sounds are so trigger, and part of the reason i like arcade MF is that her autos/passive procs sound better.
She's just that cool. Riot has to nerf her cosmetic because her coolness OP
